original_text: And the scroll of the prophet Isaiah was given to him. He unrolled the scroll and found the place where it was written,
korean_text: 선지자 이사야의 글을 드리거늘 책을 펴서 이렇게 기록된 데를 찾으시니 곧

sentences.original_text: And the scroll of the prophet Isaiah was given to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예언자 이사야의 두루마리가 그에게 주어졌다.

sentences.original_text: and found the place where it was written,
